about_the_game:
Players will play as bystanders searching for the truth, gradually uncovering the mysterious veil of the school bullying incident by collecting clues left in the ruins.

Top tier exploration experience

In this process, players need to be wary of monsters bred by malicious intent, which hide in the shadows and wait for opportunities to move. And the player's task is to identify their true identity.

The game is divided into three chapters, each centered around a major event that happened in the school that year, and players will encounter stories from these events. As the protagonist, how will you save those who are trapped in the vortex? All of this is up to you to decide.

This is an adventure game with a story driven core, where players will constantly reflect on their own cognition throughout the game until they finally uncover the true insider information.

  • After playing 'Escape from School', you will no longer fear any difficulties!

name: GET OUT SCHOOL

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 4460 or Core™ i3 9100F or AMD FX™-6300 or Ryzen™ 3 3200G
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 3770 或 Core™ i3 8350 or Core™ i3 9350F or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1500X or Ryzen™ 5 3400G
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1070 8 GB or AMD RADEON RX VEGA 56 8 GB
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: "GET OUT SCHOOL" is a horror adventure game about campus bullying. The game character, on her way home, encounters a strange event that transports her to a different high school in another time and space. As a student there, what will she face? Discover in the game!
